about_the_game:
Drift away in the serenity of the desert! Set out in your off-road truck to deliver vital technology to a forgotten, uncharted land. Explore, map out the unknown terrain, and find the way towards your destination in ADRIFT!

In ADRIFT you have one simple task, the delivery of an Energy Core.
Easier said than done, over time, sand swallowed up the infrastructure,

bridges collapsed and all maps got lost. Oh, and the Energy Core?
It’s highly unstable and will collapse if kept out in the open for too long!

With such fragile cargo, you’ll do well with taking needed precautions.
Explore and prepare a route ahead, then, a mad dash to beat the clock!

Time being of the essence, explore the area to avoid any surprises.
And with all maps gone, grab your pen and paper and take notes!

The route is set out and now, prepare for the transport of the Core,
clear the trail and repair bridges, nothing left to stop you on your way.

Focus, green light, go, don't stop, time is ever slowly ticking away.
Focus, no mistakes, nor distractions, just remember your plan.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core CPU @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Drift away in the serenity of the desert. Untwine a labyrinth abyss and find oasis’s to unwind. Unveil a forgotten land sand swallowed. But remember, once you finally get lost, ADRIFT, just you, a truck and nothingness, it marks the arrival to the beginning, from here, you start to find your way.
